overview:
Raul Nolasco is a Central-American Software Engineer. As an undergraduate at UC Santa Cruz, iOS development caught Nolascos’ attention because it enabled him to bring products to the market independently. Nolasco started working on freelance gigs found on Craigslist, and began his professional career at 22 with seasoned game developers from Appy Entertainment.

8 months after beginning his career in game development, Nolasco shipped Math&Speed, one of the most successful educational games in the world.

He is currently designing innovative apps for Orange County Development, as well as working on custom development for clients.
